name: Oqton Tooltips 1.0
description:
Our tooltip component has variants to cover the nature of all your notes, including errors, questions and info.


You can also indicate the area your note refers to by choosing the direction of arrow (bottom/side/top), or indicator (left/right).


Features


100% Auto Layout

Types: Error, Question and Informational

2 Indicator Options (left/right)

3 Arrow Options (bottom/side/top)

18 Variants
